main.title: 1st Place
contents: Bose QuietComfort SE headphones for each team member
Bellroy Tech Kit pouch for each team member
Logitech MX Keys S Combo + MX Biro for each team member

main.title: 2nd Place
contents: Sennheiser HD450BT for each team member
Logitech MX Anywhere 3 + MX Keys Mini for each team member

main.title: 3rd Place
contents: Amazon Echo for each team member
Logitech MX Biro for each team member

category.title: Best Design
category.description: Awarded to the most usable and best looking user interface.
contents: Blunt Metro Compact Umbrella for each team member

category.title: Most Creative Idea
category.description: The project that has the most original idea or reinvention.
contents: Frank Green Essentials Set for each team member

category.title: First Timers Prize
category.description: The best project created by first-time hackathon participants.
category.subtext: To be eligible, at least 50% of your team must have not attended a hackathon.
contents: Belkin BoostCharge Pro for each team member

category.title: Most Entertaining Pitch
category.description: Can you summarise your pitch in in three minutes - whilst also being engaging and entertaining?
contents: Stanley Cup for each team member

category.title: People's Choice Award
category.description: The project that wins the hearts and votes of the people.
contents: Ultimate Ears MINIROLL Speaker for each team member

category.title: Best Social Media Prize
category.description: Send out the best tweet, message, photo, story or short video that sums up your experience of #UNIHACK2024.

category.title: Best Meme
category.description: Make the best meme during the event and post it on the UNIHACK Discord. I couldn't make it any more obvious.

sponsor.title: Social Impact Prize
sponsor.description: The best idea that addresses an issue in your local community.
contents: Crumpler Communal Dwelling Bag for each team member

sponsor.title: Best Use of Datastax APIs
sponsor.description: The best idea that uses any Datastax technologies (including AstraDB and Langflow)
sponsor.subtext: In your pitch and DevPost submission, you must demonstrate how you use Datastax technologies in your project.
contents: Keychron K8 mechanical keyboard for each team member
